pkgmetadata.longdescription: Multivariate Stochastic Linear Ornstein-Uhlenbeck Models for Phylogenetic Comparative Hypotheses // Fits multivariate Ornstein-Uhlenbeck types of models to continues trait data from species related by a common evolutionary history. See K. Bartoszek, J, Pienaar, P. Mostad, S. Andersson, T. F. Hansen (2012) doi:10.1016/j.jtbi.2012.08.005. The suggested PCMBaseCpp package (which significantly speeds up the likelihood calculations) can be obtained from https://github.com/venelin/PCMBaseCpp/.
